typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		StoreID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		AccountNumber as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Customers
Customers keyGenerate(output(id_sk_customer as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyCustomers
SurrogateKeyCustomers sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		StoreID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		AccountNumber as string,
		ModifiedDate as date,
		id_sk_customer as long
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['customers.parquet'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		PersonID,
		StoreID,
		TerritoryID,
		AccountNumber,
		ModifiedDate,
		id_sk_customer
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> appcustomers
